pullRequest.body:
In fact this theorem admits a proof without using any lemmas introduced in #10170.

For this I had to remove some redundant [GCDMonoid R] assumptions in RingTheory/PrincipalIdealDomain.lean.

---

DecompositionMonoid will be a separate PR; independently I think most results about IsCoprime can be generalized to IsRelPrime (defined as `∀ p, p ∣ x → p ∣ y → IsUnit p`), and maybe we should do that first ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

Excellent, thanks!

It's especially good to have that stray `[GCDMonoid R]` now confined.

bors d+

Excellent, thanks!

It's especially good to have that stray `[GCDMonoid R]` now confined.

bors d+

This is a great proof but I think we should make it a bit easier to read:
```suggestion
theorem separable_iff_squarefree {g : K[X]} : g.Separable ↔ Squarefree g := by
  refine ⟨Separable.squarefree,
    fun sqf ↦ isCoprime_of_irreducible_dvd (not_and_of_not_left _ sqf.ne_zero) ?_⟩
  rintro p (h : Irreducible p) ⟨q, rfl⟩ (dvd : p ∣ derivative (p * q))
  suffices IsUnit p by exact h.1 this
  replace dvd : p ∣ q := by
    rw [derivative_mul, dvd_add_left (dvd_mul_right p _)] at dvd
    exact (separable_of_irreducible h).dvd_of_dvd_mul_left dvd
  exact sqf _ <| mul_dvd_mul_left _ dvd
```

Thanks! I mostly adopted your suggestion in [c79c948](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/10236/commits/c79c948495b7c59bc57ac4f5f7711a7c5c945e9f) except I combined the `suffices` line with the last `exact` as a compromise between verbosity and readability. (I also think `(sqf.ne_zero ·.1)` is nice; these side condition should ideally be automated away rather than showing up in the proof, so it's desirable to make its appearance as short as possible.)
I restored `(sqf.ne_zero ·.1)` since you thumbed up.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: golf `separable_iff_squarefree`
